languages.text: {n}Дэгген, стиснув зубы, косится на Каса, словно прикидывая куда именно лучше воткнуть нож новоявленному наследнику, как только похороны закончатся.{/n}
{n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дэгген, стиснув зубы, косится на Каса, словно прикидывая куда именно лучше воткнуть нож новоявленному наследнику, как только похороны закончатся.{/n}

{n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

languages.text: {n}达根咬紧牙关，瞪了卡斯一眼。他似乎已经下定了决心，只要这场葬礼一结束，他就一刀刺死这位新任继承人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}达根咬紧牙关，瞪了卡斯一眼。他似乎已经下定了决心，只要这场葬礼一结束，他就一刀刺死这位新任继承人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Daggen beißt die Zähne zusammen und blickt Kas von der Seite her an, als würde er überlegen, wie er den frisch ernannten Erben unmittelbar nach Ende des Begräbnisses am besten erstechen kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen beißt die Zähne zusammen und blickt Kas von der Seite her an, als würde er überlegen, wie er den frisch ernannten Erben unmittelbar nach Ende des Begräbnisses am besten erstechen kann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les dents serrées, Daggen jette un regard en coin à Kas comme pour déterminer où poignarder cet héritier nouvellement désigné une fois les funérailles terminées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les dents serrées, Daggen jette un regard en coin à Kas comme pour déterminer où poignarder cet héritier nouvellement désigné une fois les funérailles terminées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Apretando los dientes, Daggen lanza una mirada a Kas de reojo, como si intentara elegir dónde apuñalar al recién nombrado heredero en cuanto termine el funeral.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Apretando los dientes, Daggen lanza una mirada a Kas de reojo, como si intentara elegir dónde apuñalar al recién nombrado heredero en cuanto termine el funeral.{/n}

languages.text: {n}歯を食いしばりながら、ダゲンはキャスを横目で睨んだ。まるで、葬儀が終わり次第、新しく後継者に指名された人物をどこで刺してやろうか、と考えてでもいるかのように。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}歯を食いしばりながら、ダゲンはキャスを横目で睨んだ。まるで、葬儀が終わり次第、新しく後継者に指名された人物をどこで刺してやろうか、と考えてでもいるかのように。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dişlerini sıkan Daggen, cenaze bittiği anda yeni vârisi neresinden şişleyeceğini düşünüyormuş gibi Kas'a yan yan bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Daggen shoots Kas a sideways glance as if he is deciding where best to stab the newly appointed heir as soon as the funeral is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dişlerini sıkan Daggen, cenaze bittiği anda yeni vârisi neresinden bıçaklayacağına karar verirmiş gibi Kas'a ters bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
